sentence.Network_en: Find Bernie and get him to knock an agreement together.
sentence.Network_cn: 找到伯尼，让他尽快拟好一份协议。

sentence.Network_en: They decided to knock the two rooms into one.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们决定把两间屋子打通连成一间。

sentence.Network_en: What they said was a real knock to my self-confidence.
sentence.Network_cn: 他们的话是对我自信心的一次重大打击。

entry.def: Someone who is knock-kneed has legs which turn inwards at the knees.

means.word_mean: 1. having the knees abnormally close together and the ankles wide apart
